section.title: Configuration
section.para: There are only two parameter which can be configured. Both are exposed as JMX properties. The JMX bean can be accessed under slee:sipregistrarconfigurator=v2RegistrarConf name.

listitem.para: sets lower boundry acceptable for Expires header. Its expressed in seconds and has default value of 120.
sets upper boundry for Expires header. Its expressed in seconds and has default value of 3600.
